entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Oromocto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:40 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
